name: Out of Control!!!
description:
Hello and Welcome!

This game was made for GMTK Game Jam 2020. Theme: Out of Control!

Controls (sort of):

=> Enter: start/pause/unpause;

=> Right Arrow: rotate ship clockwise;

=> Left Arrow: rotate ship counter-clockwise;

You are in a ship with a severe electrical problem. This problem is making the propulsion system to go wild (you have no control over it) and the maneuver system becomes unstable. You are in the middle of an asteroid belt... 

Your only hope is to reach the planet for repairs... Good Luck!!! You'll needed  it, trust me!

Try to reach the highest level without exploding!!!

This game was made with ct.js (https://ctjs.rocks/).

Sprites made by Tatermand (https://opengameart.org/users/tatermand)

Music made by Tallbeard Studios (https://tallbeard.itch.io/)

If you want the full source code/project of this game:
https://pkgames.itch.io/out-of-control-full-ctjs-project

Have fun and tell me what you thought about this game.
